backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user cards with access control, card creation, retrieval, and sale price updates using Map and List storage.
feature_evidence.json: Machineâ€‘generated report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend components, hooks, and pages for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling early token extraction, Internet Identity auth, actor initialization with timeouts, profile loading, and UI error handling.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: Dialog form allowing users to add cards with free-text rarity, autocomplete suggestions, validation, and mutation to backend.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Autocomplete text input with filtered suggestions, click-outside closing, and optional placeholder and required flag.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Displays a card with rarity styling, pricing, and actions to edit, sell/trade, or delete using related dialogs.
frontend/src/components/CraftedCardsModa: Modal listing crafted cards with rarity badges, purchase info, and details like country, league, and position.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Dialog for editing card fields, validating input, and submitting updates via updateCard mutation.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches render errors and shows a detailed alert with optional stack trace and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app title, user greeting, and login/logout button using Internet Identity auth.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal forcing initial profile setup by collecting and saving the user's name.
frontend/src/components/SellOrTradeDialo: Component providing a dialog to sell, trade, or add cards with rarity styling and form handling logic.
frontend/src/components/SoldCardsModal.t: Modal showing sold and traded cards with profit/loss calculations and expandable trade details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Hook exposing React Query state for actor initialization with helpers for detecting errors and retrying.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, cards, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining color themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the root application.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Displays user cards with search and multiple filters, generating filter options from card data and rendering filtered results. Also provides a dialog for adding new cards.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Aggregates and displays investment, return, and transaction statistics, including sold and crafted card summaries. Loads multiple metrics, computes profit/loss, and renders portfolio overview UI with modals.
frontend/src/utils/cardSuggestions.ts: Generates unique field-based suggestions from cards and filters them by user input. Provides helpers for country, league, club, and season suggestions.
frontend/src/utils/redactSecrets.ts: Redacts sensitive values from strings and errors, including query parameters and sessionStorage references. Provides utilities to safely sanitize error output.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across navigation, including hash-based routes. Includes helpers for sessionStorage persistence and clearing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate. Extends UI tokens and layout rules for the application.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, known issues, and existing feature requirements related to URL token handling and backend connection errors.
